DND4EBETA.title: Dungeons & Dragons 4th Edition Beta
DND4EBETA.AbilityUseChargedHint: This {type} is charged and ready to use!
DND4EBETA.AbilityUseConsumableChargeHint: Using this {type} will consume 1 charge of {value} remaining.
DND4EBETA.AbilityUseConsumableDestroyHin: Using this {type} will consume it's final charge and it will be destroyed.
DND4EBETA.AbilityUseConsumableQuantityHi: Using this {type} will consume 1 quantity of {quantity} remaining
DND4EBETA.AbilityUseHint: Configure how you would like to use the {name} {type}.
DND4EBETA.AbilityUseNormalHint: This {type} has {value} of {max} uses per {per} remaining.
DND4EBETA.AbilityUseRechargedHint: This {type} is depleted and must be recharged!
DND4EBETA.AbilityUseUnavailableHint: There are no uses of this item remaining!
DND4EBETA.BonusesHint: Define global bonuses as formulas which are added to certain rolls. For example: 1d4 + 2
DND4EBETA.BonusesInstructions: Configure character bonuses which are added to the appropriate dice roll
DND4EBETA.ChatContextButtonTitle: Right click with a token selected for full damage options
DND4EBETA.ChatFlavorPlaceholder: If this is not set the Description tab will be used instead
DND4EBETA.ConsumableLastChargeWarn: This is the last charge of this unit and consuming it will also reduce the item's quantity by 1
DND4EBETA.ConsumeWarningNoQuantity: {name} has run out of its designated {type}!
DND4EBETA.ConsumeWarningNoResource: {name} is designated to consume {type} but no resource is specified!
DND4EBETA.ConsumeWarningNoSource: The designated {type} source that {name} consumes no longer exists!
DND4EBETA.ConsumeWarningZeroAttribute: {name} has run out of its designated attribute resource pool!
DND4EBETA.CriticalHitTitle: Natural D20 Dice roll required for a hit to be considered a critical hit.
DND4EBETA.CriticalHitPlaceholder: Critical Hit die defaults to value of 20
DND4EBETA.CurrencyConvertHint: Convert all carried currency to the highest possible denomination to reduce the amount of coinage carried by the character. Be wary, this action cannot be undone.
DND4EBETA.DeathSaveCriticalSuccess: has critically succeeded on a death saving throw and may now spend 1 healing surge to regain hitpoints.
DND4EBETA.DeathSaveFailure: has died with 3 death save failures!
DND4EBETA.DeathSaveSuccess: has survived with 3 death save successes and is now stable!
DND4EBETA.DeleteConfirmContent: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This cannot be undone.
DND4EBETA.description: A comprehensive game system for running games of Dungeons & Dragons 4th Edition in the Foundry VTT environment.
DND4EBETA.DiceBrutalPlaceholder: Brutal Die defaults to value of 1
DND4EBETA.DiceBrutalTitle: The value of which weapon dice rolls equal to and lower shall be rerolled until a higher number is rolled.
DND4EBETA.EffectHTMLInput: Use Rich Text Editor? (Good for complex effects)
DND4EBETA.FilterNoSpells: No spells found for this set of filters.
DND4EBETA.FlagsCritThresholdHint: Allow for expanded critical range; for example Improved or Superior Critical
DND4EBETA.FlagsElvenAccuracyHint: Roll an extra d20 with advantage to Dex, Int, Wis, or Cha.
DND4EBETA.FlagsHalflingLuckyHint: Reroll ones when rolling d20 checks.
DND4EBETA.FlagsInitiativeAdvHint: Provided by feats or magical items.
DND4EBETA.FlagsInstructions: Configure character features and traits which fine-tune behaviors of the D&D4e system.
DND4EBETA.FlagsJOATHint: Half-Proficiency to Ability Checks in which you are not already Proficient.
DND4EBETA.FlagsObservantHint: Provides a +5 to passive Perception and Investigation.
DND4EBETA.FlagsRemarkableAthleteHint: Half-Proficiency (rounded-up) to physical Ability Checks and Initiative.
DND4EBETA.FlagsSavageAttacksHint: Adds extra critical hit weapon dice.
DND4EBETA.HealingMenuGainSurgeValueDesc: If this is checked the healing / temp hp will include the healing surge value.  Unchecked it will just be situational bonus
DND4EBETA.HealingMenuHealingPotionSettin: Configure healing for a standard potion
DND4EBETA.HealingMenuOutOfSurges: You have no healing surges remaining
DND4EBETA.HealingMenuSpendHealingSurgeDe: Some healing does not need you to spend surges.  (E.g. Paladins lay on hands ability)
DND4EBETA.HealingSurgeSpend: Can spend and regain Surge Amount
DND4EBETA.HealingSurgeWarning: You do not have enough healing surges to recover any Hit Points from this source.
DND4EBETA.HealingOverWarning: You can not recover any more hitpoits at this time.
DND4EBETA.HitDiceWarn: {name} has no available {formula} Hit Dice remaining!
DND4EBETA.InvalidHealingBonus: Invalid roll input into healing surge bonus.  Using 0
DND4EBETA.LackRequiredWeapon: You may not use this power as you do not have the proper weapon equipped.
DND4EBETA.LongRestResult: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {health} Hit Points and {dice} Hit Dice.
DND4EBETA.MissFormulaPlaceholder: Half damage can easily be applied form the damage menu, no need for a separate formula
DND4EBETA.Name: Character Name
DND4EBETA.NeedTokenSelected: You must have a token selected to apply damage
DND4EBETA.NoSpellLevels: This character has no spellcaster levels, but you may add spells manually.
DND4EBETA.PolymorphKeepClass: Keep proficiency bonus (leaves class items in sheet)
DND4EBETA.PolymorphKeepMental: Keep mental ability scores (Int, Wis, Cha)
DND4EBETA.PolymorphKeepPhysical: Keep physical ability scores (Str, Dex, Con)
DND4EBETA.PolymorphMergeSaves: Merge saving throw proficiencies (take the highest)
DND4EBETA.PolymorphRevertWarn: You do not have permission to revert this Actor's polymorphed state.
DND4EBETA.PolymorphWarn: You are not allowed to polymorph this actor!
DND4EBETA.PowerRechargePlaceholder: Input minimum number needed to be rolled on 1d6.
DND4EBETA.PowerTextFieldsPlaceholder: For Rolls and Formulae, use double square brackets: e.g. [[1d4 + @chaMod]]
DND4EBETA.PrimaryDamageTypeTitle: Type of Damage Dealt by primary attack.
DND4EBETA.QuickRoll: Alt-Click or Shift-Click for a Quick Roll
DND4EBETA.ShortRestHint: Take a short rest? On a short rest you may spend remaining Hit Dice and recover primary or secondary resources.
DND4EBETA.ShortRestResult: {name} takes a short rest spending {dice} Hit Dice to recover {health} Hit Points.
DND4EBETA.SpellCastHint: Configure how you would like to cast the
DND4EBETA.SpellCastNoSlots: You have no available spell slots to cast this spell
DND4EBETA.ToolFormulaDescription: Leave this blank and it will roll 1d20 + (selected skill or ability bonus) + (tool bonus)
SETTINGS.4eAutoCollapseCardL: Automatically collapse Item Card descriptions in the Chat Log
SETTINGS.4eAutomationCombatL: Determine whether the Attack Rolls hits or misses.
SETTINGS.4eAutoSpellTemplateL: When a spell is cast, defaults to begin the process to create the corresponding Measured Template if any (requires TRUSTED or higher player role)
SETTINGS.4eCollapseSituationalBonusL: If checked: all common situational modifiers will be computed and added as a single modifier to @bonus.  Otherwise each will be displayed individually in the resulting formula
SETTINGS.4eCurWtL: Carried currency affects character encumbrance following the rules on PHB pg. 212.
SETTINGS.4eDamageCalcL: Configure which version of the rules damage resistance, vulnerability and immunities will be used. Errata favors offense using the lowest resistance, while the PHB rules even split the damage types and use individual resistances.
SETTINGS.4eDebugPowerEffectsL: Will output a lot of debug information to the console when attempting to apply effects to power attack and damage rolls.  Useful to see why a given effect is applying at a given value
SETTINGS.4eDiagL: Configure which diagonal movement rule should be used for games within this system.
SETTINGS.4eHalfLevelOptionsL: Allows the ability to turn off half levels for: Ability, Defense, Skills and Initiative score values.
SETTINGS.4eInitTBL: Append the raw Dexterity ability score to break ties in Initiative.
SETTINGS.4eItemDeleteConfirmationL: When enabled, a confirmation dialog will display when trying to delete any power or inventory item
SETTINGS.4eNoExpL: Remove experience bars from character sheets.
SETTINGS.4eNpcMathOptionsL: Determines if the Advanced Math Options for NPCs is set during their generation
SETTINGS.4ePowerAutoGenerateLableOptionL: When creating a new power, determine if the option to "Auto Generate Power Card Details" is set.
SETTINGS.4eShowRollExpressionL: Display the formula used to create a given d20 or damage roll.  Useful to find out how a roll was calculate but may be confusing for novice users
MIGRATION.4eBegin: Applying DnD4E System Migration for version {version}. Please be patient and do not close your game or shut down your server.
MIGRATION.4eComplete: DnD4E System Migration to version {version} completed!
MIGRATION.4eVersionTooOldWarning: Your DnD4e system data is from too old a Foundry version and cannot be reliably migrated to the latest version. The process will be attempted, but errors may occur.
